mapper.select: SELECT A.REVIEW_CONTENT , A.REVIEW_NO , A.RATINGS , B.ANS_CONTENT , E.MEMBER_ID , C.USE_DATE , F.FILE_NAME proFileName , G.FILE_NAME FROM REVIEW A LEFT JOIN REVIEW_ANS B ON(A.REVIEW_NO = B.REVIEW_NO) LEFT JOIN WAITING_RECORD C ON(A.RECORD_NO = C.RECORD_NO) LEFT JOIN COM_INFO D ON(C.COM_NO = D.COM_NO) LEFT JOIN MEMBER_INFO E ON(E.MEMBER_ID = C.MEMBER_ID) LEFT JOIN USER_INFO_ATTACH F ON(F.MEMBER_ID = E.MEMBER_ID) LEFT JOIN REVIEW_ATTACH G ON(A.REVIEW_NO = G.REVIEW_NO) WHERE A.COM_NO = #{ comNo } ORDER BY C.USE_DATE DESC
SELECT TRUNC(AVG(RATINGS),1) AVG_RATINSG FROM REVIEW WHERE COM_NO = #{ comNo }

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REVIEW A JOIN COM_INFO B ON(A.COM_NO = B.COM_NO) JOIN WAITING_RECORD C ON(A.RECORD_NO = C.RECORD_NO)
B.COM_NAME LIKE '%' || #{ searchValue } || '%'
C.MEMBER_ID LIKE '%' || #{ searchValue } || '%'

SELECT A.REVIEW_NO , A.REVIEW_CONTENT , A.RATINGS , A.RECORD_NO , A.COM_NO , B.ANS_NO , B.ANS_CONTENT , B.REG_DATE FROM REVIEW A LEFT JOIN REVIEW_ANS B ON(A.REVIEW_NO = B.REVIEW_NO) WHERE A.REVIEW_NO = #{ reviewNo }
